short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enabling AI to use computers like humans

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Local development environment for your web agent workflow. Build and test your workflows here, then scale up using our API. 
Integrate with any web service that doesn't offer an API or create workflows across websites for example
- Data rooms in financial services
- Scheduling software of medical practices
- Data pipeline enrichment with live web data
